mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS (city, zipcode, detail, member_id) VALUES (#{city}, #{zipcode}, #{detail}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, city, zipcode, detail, member_id FROM ADDRESS WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT id, city, zipcode, detail, member_id FROM ADDRESS WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADDRESS SET city = #{city}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, detail = #{detail}, status = #{status}, status_update_time = #{statusUpdateTime}, member_id = #{memberId} WHERE id = #{id}
